sessions.name: Semester start
sessions.location: Semester of all courses will start

sessions.name: Mid term examination
sessions.description: Mid term examination will start by the specified date abow. All the courses will be subjected within this date period except the architecturing course students. Students are advised to get ready. Good luck

sessions.name: Online examination
sessions.description: Online examination for all lab sessions of all courses will be conducted within the above period.

sessions.name: Continuous Assesment
sessions.description: Continuous examination will start by the specified date abow. All the courses will be subjected within this date period except the architecturing course students. Students are advised to get ready. Good luck

sessions.name: Student Forum
sessions.description: Student forum will be conducted by student council

sessions.name: Final Exam
sessions.description: Final Exam will be starting on the given date for all the courses.

sessions.name: Semester End
sessions.description: Semester will end in the above mentioned date and the vaccation will be given from following days
